metadata.title: CVE-2018-11577 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Liblouis 3.5.0 has a Segmentation fault in lou_logPrint in logging.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11577` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.3
liblouis-data - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.3
liblouis2 - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.3
python-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.3
python3-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-2ubuntu1.3').
